describe: Pickfood is a review based Mern stack project made with MongoDB and...
first: PickFood is a Mern stack review project made with MongoDB and ReactJs.
second: Any user can visit the website, but they cannot visit all routes.
third: Only registered users can visit all routes and use all features of this website.
forth: Registered user add review for food,also add product,delete and update his product review.
fifth: Client side and server side also available here.

describe: This is an Online quiz system based on react js and tailwind and also responsive client...
first: QuiZone is react based online quiz test web application.
second: Any user visit this website and participate any quiz test.
third: User can see the right answer after giving quiz test.
forth: Here a blog section is available and user can read blogs.
fifth: Here use react rechart for showing all subject and question ratio.

describe: IceBox is a  previous product-selling website, complete with full functionality with mong...
first: IceBox is and old product selling website based on mongodb and react js.
second: There are 3 type of user here such as buyer,seller and admin.
third: Admin manage all buyer and seller,he remove and verify any seller easily
forth: Buyer buy something and also report to admin for a product,after buying product he see the order list on his dashboard.Buyer pay using stripe payment system.
fifth: Seller add product,advertise his product and also delete this.
